data.title: Profiles: Grand Dukes and Consorts of Mecklenburg-Schwerin
data.meta_description: Friedrich Franz I Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin Titles: Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (1785-1815); Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (1815-1837) Born: December 10, 1756 in Schwerin Parents: Lu…
data.text:
Friedrich Franz I

Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Titles: Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (1785-1815); Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (1815-1837)

Born: December 10, 1756 in Schwerin

Parents: Ludwig, Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin and Princess Charlotte Sophie of Saxe-Coburg-Saalfeld

Married: June 1, 1775 to Princess Luise of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg

Children:

– stillborn daughter (1776)

– stillborn son (1777)

– Friedrich Ludwig, Hereditary Grand Duke (1778)

– Luise Charlotte (1779)

– Gustav Wilhelm (1781)

– Karl (1782)

– Charlotte Friederike (1784)

– Adolf (1785)

REIGN: June 17, 1815 – February 1, 1837

Died: February 1, 1837 in Ludwigslust

Buried: Doberan Minster

Unofficial Royalty: Friedrich Franz I, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Luise of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg

Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: March 9, 1756 in Roda, Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg

Parents: Prince Johann August of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg and Countess Luise Reuss of Schleiz

Married: June 1, 1775 to Grand Duke Friedrich Franz I

Children:

– stillborn daughter (1776)

– stillborn son (1777)

– Friedrich Ludwig, Hereditary Grand Duke (1778)

– Luise Charlotte (1779)

– Gustav Wilhelm (1781)

– Karl (1782)

– Charlotte Friederike (1784)

– Adolf (1785)

Died: January 1, 1808 at Schloss Ludwigslust

Buried: Duchess Luise Mausoleum, Schloss Ludwigslust

Unofficial Royalty: Luise of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg, Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

* * * * * * * * * *

Paul Friedrich

Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: September 15, 1800 in Ludwigslust

Parents: Friedrich Ludwig, Hereditary Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin and Grand Duchess Elena Pavlovna of Russia

Married: May 25, 1822 to Princess Alexandrine of Prussia

Children:

– Grand Duke Friedrich Franz II (1823)

– Luise (1824)

– Wilhelm (1827)

– Helene (1829)

– Marie (1831)

– Pauline (1833)

REIGN: February 1, 1837 – March 7, 1842

Died: March 7, 1842 in Schwerin

Buried: Schwerin Cathedral

Unofficial Royalty: Paul Friedrich, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Alexandrine of Prussia

Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: February 23, 1803 in Berlin

Parents: King Friedrich Wilhelm III of Prussia and Princess Luise of Mecklenburg-Strelitz

Married: May 25, 1822 to Grand Duke Paul Friedrich

Children:

– Grand Duke Friedrich Franz II (1823)

– Luise (1824)

– Wilhelm (1827)

– Helene (1829)

– Marie (1831)

– Pauline (1833)

Died: April 21, 1892 in Schwerin

Buried: Schwerin Cathedral

Unofficial Royalty: Alexandrine of Prussia, Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

* * * * * * * * * *

Friedrich Franz II

Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: February 28, 1823 in Ludwigslust

Parents: Paul Friedrich, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin and Princess Alexandrine of Prussia

Married(1): November 3, 1849 to Princess Auguste Reuss of Köstritz

Children:

– Friedrich Franz III, Grand Duke (1851)

– Paul Friedrich (1852)

– Marie (1854)

– Nikolaus (1855)

– Johann Albrecht (1857)

– Alexander (1859)

Married(2): July 4, 1864 to Princess Anne of Hesse and by Rhine

Children:

– Anne (1865)

Married(3): July 4, 1868 to Princess Marie of Schwarzburg-Rudolstadt

Children:

– Elisabeth (1869)

– Friedrich Wilhelm (1871)

– Adolf Friedrich (1873)

– Heinrich (1876)

REIGN: March 7, 1842 – April 15, 1883

Died: April 15, 1883 in Schwerin

Buried: Schwerin Cathedral

Unofficial Royalty: Friedrich Franz II, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Auguste Reuss of Köstritz

Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: May 26, 1822 in Klipphausen, Saxony

Parents: Heinrich LXIII, Prince Reuss of Köstritz

Married: November 3, 1849 to Grand Duke Friedrich Franz II

Children:

– Friedrich Franz III, Grand Duke (1851)

– Paul Friedrich (1852)

– Marie (1854)

– Nikolaus (1855)

– Johann Albrecht (1857)

– Alexander (1859)

Died: March 3, 1862 in Schwerin

Buried: Schwerin Cathedral

Unofficial Royalty: Auguste Reuss of Köstritz, Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Anna of Hesse and by Rhine

Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: May 25, 1843 in Bessungen, Hesse

Parents: Prince Karl of Hesse and by Rhine and Princess Elisabeth of Prussia

Married: July 4, 1864 to Grand Duke Friedrich Franz II

Children:

– Anne (1865)

Died: April 16, 1865 in Schwerin

Buried: Schwerin Cathedral

Unofficial Royalty: Anna of Hesse and by Rhine, Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Marie of Schwarzburg-Rudolstadt

Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: January 29, 1850 in Raben Steinfeld, Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Parents: Adolf of Schwarzburg-Rudolstadt and Mathilde ot Schönburg-Waldenburg

Married(3): July 4, 1868 to Princess Marie of Schwarzburg-Rudolstadt

Children:

– Elisabeth (1869)

– Friedrich Wilhelm (1871)

– Adolf Friedrich (1873)

– Heinrich (1876)

Died: April 22, 1922 in The Hague, Netherlands

Buried: Schwerin Cathedral

Unofficial Royalty: Marie of Schwarzburg-Rudolstadt, Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

* * * * * * * * * *

Friedrich Franz III

Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: March 19, 1851 in Ludwigslust

Parents: Grand Duke Friedrich Franz II and Princess Augusta of Reuss-Köstritz

Married: January 24, 1879 to Grand Duchess Anastasia Mikhailovna of Russia

Children:

– Alexandrine (1879)

– Grand Duke Friedrich Franz IV (1882)

– Cecilie (1886)

REIGN: April 15, 1883 – April 10, 1897

Died: April 10, 1897 in Cannes

Buried: Helena Pavlovna Mausoleum, Ludwigslust

Unofficial Royalty: Friedrich Franz III, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Anastasia Mikhailovna of Russia

Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: July 28, 1860, Peterhof Palace, St Petersburg, Russia

Parents: Grand Duke Mikhail Nikolaevich of Russia and Princess Cecilie Auguste of Baden

Married: January 24, 1879 to Grand Duke Friedrich Franz III

Children:

– Alexandrine (1879)

– Grand Duke Friedrich Franz IV (1882)

– Cecilie (1886)

Died: March 11, 1922 in Èze, France

Buried: Helena Pavlovna Mausoleum, Ludwigslust

Unofficial Royalty: Anastasia Mikhailovna of Russia, Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

* * * * * * * * * *

Friedrich Franz IV

Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: April 9, 1882 in Palermo, Italy

Parents: Grand Duke Friedrich Franz III and Grand Duchess Anastasia Mikhailovna of Russia

Married: June 7, 1904 to Princess Alexandra of Hanover and Cumberland

Children:

– Friedrich Franz, Hereditary Grand Duke (1910)

– Christian Ludwig (1912)

– Olga (1916)

– Thyra (1919)

– Anastasia (1922)

REIGN: April 10, 1897 – November 14, 1918 (abdicated)

Died: November 17, 1945 in Flensburg, Germany

Buried: New Cemetery in Glücksburg

Unofficial Royalty: Friedrich Franz IV, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Alexandra of Hanover and Cumberland

Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Born: September 29, 1882 at Schloss Ort in Gmunden

Parents: Ernst August, Crown Prince of Hanover and Princess Thyra of Denmark

Married: June 7, 1904 to Princess Alexandra of Hanover and Cumberland

Children:

– Friedrich Franz, Hereditary Grand Duke (1910)

– Christian Ludwig (1912)

– Olga (1916)

– Thyra (1919)

– Anastasia (1922)

Died: August 30, 1963 at Glücksburg Castle in Glücksburg, Schleswig-Holstein

Buried: New Cemetery in Glücksburg

Unofficial Royalty: Alexandra of Hanover and Cumberland, Grand Duchess of Mecklenburg-Schwerin
